entry.title: Winter Storm Watch issued April 05 at 2:41AM MDT until April 07 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: .Snow will develop early Wednesday morning and continue through most of the day. The heaviest snow is expected in the morning, with up to 6 inches possible in the higher elevations above 5500 feet and north facing slopes.
